medi:segment.medi:documentation:
UNH, Message header A service segment starting and uniquely identifying a message. The message type code for the Multiple payment order message is PAYMUL.
Note: Multiple payment order messages conforming to this document must contain the following data in segment UNH, composite S009:
Data element 0065 PAYMUL 0052 D 0054 08A 0051 UN

BGM, Beginning of message A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the PAYMUL message using its type and number and when necessary its function.
Note: The identification will be passed back to the ordering customer for reconciliation purposes, if a reference is not quoted in the B- level.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by codeor name. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the document name.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of a document.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a document/message by its numberand eventually its version or revision.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the function of the message.
Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required ortransmitted.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment specifying the date and if required the time when the message is created.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, Business function A segment providing information to the ordered bank to route the message, or for tariffing or for the provision of some statistical information.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify a business reason.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of business function.
Code describing the specific business function.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Free form description of a business.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a geographical area.
Code specifying a type of financial transaction.
Identification of a bank operation by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying a bank operation.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating an intra-company payment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: RFF-DTM A group of segments identifying any previously sent message.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, Reference A segment specifying the reference number of another message.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying a reference.
Identifies a reference.
To identify a line of a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the creation date of the referenced message.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: FII-CTA-COM A group of segments identifying the financial institutions involved in the multiple payment order and the routing functions with their contacts.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, Financial institution information A segment identifying the financial institutions associated with the transaction in coded or uncoded form and their function.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
Identification of an account holder by accountnumber and/or account holder name in one or twolines. Number preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify the holder of an account.
Name of the holder of an account.
Name of the holder of an account.
Code specifying a monetary unit.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a financial institution by codebranch number, or name and name of place. Code orbranch number preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the name of an institution.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
To identify a branch of an institution.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of an institution.
Name of the location of a branch of an institution.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of the country or othergeographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 andUN/ECE Recommendation 3.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, Contact information A segment identifying a person or department for the party specified in the leading FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g.department or person).
Code and/or name of a contact such as a departmentor employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a contact, such as a department oremployee.
Name of a contact, such as a department or employee.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, Communication contact A segment providing communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Communication number of a department or employee ina specified channel.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a communication address.
Code specifying the type of communication address.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: NAD-CTA-COM A group of segments identifying the ordering party, which is valid for all payment orders.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, Name and address Name and address for the ordering customer.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the identity of a party.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by name, oneto five lines. Party name may be formatted.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Code specifying the representation of a party name.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Street address and/or PO Box number in a structuredaddress: one to four lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Name of a city.
To specify a country subdivision, such as state,canton, county, prefecture.

Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of a country subdivision, such as state, canton,county, prefecture.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the postal zone or address.
Identification of the name of the country or othergeographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 andUN/ECE Recommendation 3.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, Contact information A segment identifying a portion or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g.department or person).
Code and/or name of a contact such as a departmentor employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a contact, such as a department oremployee.
Name of a contact, such as a department or employee.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, Communication contact A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Communication number of a department or employee ina specified channel.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a communication address.
Code specifying the type of communication address.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: LIN-DTM-RFF-BUS-FCA-SG5-SG6-SG7-SG8-SG9-SG10- SG11 This segment group contains information regarding the debit side of this transaction and details which are pertinent to all payments specified in the message. Certain payment details may be provided either in segment group 4 or in segment group 11, but not in both.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, Line item A segment identifying the line item by a current line number.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To identify a line item.
Code specifying the action to be taken or alreadytaken.
Goods identification for a specified source.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify an item.
Coded identification of an item type.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To provide an indication that a segment or segmentgroup is used to contain sub-line or sub-line iteminformation and to optionally enable the sub-line tobe identified.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code indicating a sub-line item.
To identify a line item.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify a level within a configuration.
Code specifying the configuration operation.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the date, at which an order has been requested to be executed or acted upon.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segment.medi:documentation:
RFF, Reference A segment specifying the reference of the single debit amount on the debit side of the Transaction (B level).
Note: The identification will be passed back to the Ordering Customer for reconciliation purposes.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying a reference.
Identifies a reference.
To identify a line of a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, Business function A segment identifying certain characteristics of the payment orders stored on level C, such as business function.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify a business reason.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of business function.
Code describing the specific business function.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a geographical area.
Code specifying a type of financial transaction.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying a bank operation.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating an intra-company payment.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, Financial charges allocation A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances (e.g. charges to be borne by the ordering customer), and identifying the ordering customer's account to which such charges or allowances should be directed where it is different from the principal account. This constitutes a default specification and may be overridden at detail level.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the means of settlement.
Identification of the account for charge orallowance.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a branch of an institution.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
To identify the holder of an account.
Code specifying a monetary unit.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: MOA-CUX-DTM-RFF A group of segments containing the currency of the single amounts in level C, currency to be transferred, plus the total of all single amounts of level C.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, Monetary amount A segment specifying the total amount and the currency to be transferred.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetaryamount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of monetary amount.
To specify a monetary amount.
Code specifying a monetary unit.
Code qualifying the type of currency.
Code specifying a status.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, Currencies A segment specifying the source currency and the destination currency of the transaction, when they are different. The rate of exchange is solely used when previously agreed between the ordering customer and the ordered bank.

medi:field.medi:documentation: The usage to which a currency relates.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the usage of a currency.
Code specifying a monetary unit.
Code qualifying the type of currency.
To specify the value of the multiplication factor usedin expressing currency units.

medi:field.medi:documentation: The usage to which a currency relates.

Code specifying a monetary unit.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the rate at which one specified currency isexpressed in another specified currency.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed. The other occurrence identifies the reference date.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, Reference A segment identifying the deal between ordered bank and ordering customer.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying a reference.
Identifies a reference.
To identify a line of a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: FII-CTA-COM A group of segments containing an account servicing bank including the account to be debited. Another occurrence can be used to specify the account for the return of unsuccessful transactions. If the ordering party is not quoted separately in the NAD-segment on level-B or level-A, then this group also contains the information of the ordering party.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, Financial institution information A segment identifying the financial institution and relevant account number with the currency.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
Identification of an account holder by accountnumber and/or account holder name in one or twolines. Number preferred.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, Contact information A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: NAD-CTA-COM A group of segments identifying the ordering party mutually exclusive with NAD-segment on level-A for the ordering party (Ordering customer and payor). Furthermore, one contact party can also be quoted in this group.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, Name and address A segment identifying the name and address of the non- financial institutions associated with the PAYMUL.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, Contact information A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g.department or person).
Code and/or name of a contact such as a departmentor employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a contact, such as a department oremployee.
Name of a contact, such as a department or employee.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, Communication contact A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Communication number of a department or employee ina specified channel.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a communication address.
Code specifying the type of communication address.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: INP-FTX-DTM A group of segments containing instructions from the ordering customer relating to parties identified in the NAD and FII segments. It specifies action to be taken by the identified parties and the date (and optionally time) by which such action needs to be taken.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, Parties and instruction A segment identifying the party originating the instruction and the parties to be contacted. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identify the sending and receiving parties of theinstruction.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify the party enacting an instruction.
Code specifying the party to receive an instruction.

Code specifying an instruction.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, Free text A segment providing free text instruction relating to the associated INP segment.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment specifying the earliest and the latest dates and times by which the instruction specified in the INP and/or FTX segment(s) needs to be carried out.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment group 9: GEI-MOA-LOC-NAD-RCS-FTX A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It also identifies the regulatory authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.
This group is mutually exclusive with Segment Group 15.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, Processing information A segment identifying what processing should be completed by regulatory authorities.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the processing information.
Identification of the processing indicator.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying a processing indicator.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a type of process.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, Requirements and conditions A segment giving the nature (e.g. goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: PRC-FTX A group of segments - mutually exclusive with level -C- containing the details of payment, which are determined for all payments on level C.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, Process identification A segment identifying the kind of free text following this segment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of process type and description.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, Free text A segment for information in coded or in clear form to provide information from the ordering customer to the beneficiary.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: SEQ-MOA-DTM-BUS-RFF-PAI-FCA-SG12-SG13- SG14-SG15-SG16 This segment group contains information regarding the Beneficiaries of the payments. Certain payment details may be provided either in segment group 11 or in segment group 4, but not in both.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, Sequence details A segment identifying the beginning of the credit side of the transaction (C level) by a sequential number, which may also be used for reconciliation purposes.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the action to be taken or alreadytaken.
Identification of a sequence and source forsequencing.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a position in a sequence.
Code specifying the source of a sequence identifier.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, Monetary amount A segment giving the amount value of the payment. It is the amount to be transferred. The currency is quoted on the debit side of the transaction (level B).

medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetaryamount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of monetary amount.
To specify a monetary amount.
Code specifying a monetary unit.
Code qualifying the type of currency.
Code specifying a status.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying date(s)/time(s) related to the beneficiary's side.

The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, Business function A segment identifying business information (per credit) for the payment order.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify a business reason.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of business function.
Code describing the specific business function.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Free form description of a business.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a geographical area.
Code specifying a type of financial transaction.
Identification of a bank operation by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying a bank operation.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating an intra-company payment.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, Reference A segment identifying a transaction from the ordering customer to the beneficiary and/or from the ordering customer to the ordered bank.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying a reference.
Identifies a reference.
To identify a line of a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, Payment instructions A segment specifying the conditions, method and channel of payment for the payment order.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Indication of method of payment employed or to beemployed.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the payment conditions.
Code specifying the means of payment guarantee.
Code identifying a means of payment.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Code specifying the payment channel.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, Financial charges allocation A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying the ordering customer's account to which such charges or allowances should be directed where it is different from the principal amount. This segment is mutually exclusive with the FCA segment in Segment Group 4.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the means of settlement.
Identification of the account for charge orallowance.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a branch of an institution.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
To identify the holder of an account.
Code specifying a monetary unit.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: FII-CTA-COM A group of segments containing the beneficiary's bank and the account and if necessary up to two intermediary banks.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, Financial institution information A segment identifying the financial institution and relevant account number with the currency.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
Identification of an account holder by accountnumber and/or account holder name in one or twolines. Number preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify the holder of an account.
Name of the holder of an account.
Name of the holder of an account.
Code specifying a monetary unit.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a financial institution by codebranch number, or name and name of place. Code orbranch number preferred.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of the name of the country or othergeographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 andUN/ECE Recommendation 3.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, Contact information A segment identifying a person or a department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the function of a contact (e.g.department or person).
Code and/or name of a contact such as a departmentor employee. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a contact, such as a department oremployee.
Name of a contact, such as a department or employee.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, Communication contact A segment providing a communication number for the party identified in the FII Segment and optionally for the intermediary banks.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a communication address.
Code specifying the type of communication address.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: NAD-CTA-COM A group of segments identifying the name and address of the beneficiary and one contact party.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, Name and address A segment identifying the name and address of the non- financial institutions associated with the payment on the beneficiary's side.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: INP-FTX-DTM A group of segments containing instructions from the ordering customer relating to parties identified in the NAD and FII segments. It specifies action to be taken by the identified parties and the date (and optionally time) by which such action needs to be taken.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, Parties and instruction A segment identifying the party originating the instruction and the parties to be contacted. It specifies where appropriate the instruction in coded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: DOC-MOA-DTM-RFF-NAD-SG18-SG19-SG20 A group of segments providing details of all documents, e.g., invoices, statements, despatch advices, etc..., to which the Multiple Payment Order refers. It includes information on the monetary amounts for each document and on any adjustments (with an indication of the reason for adjustments) and discounts. For information purposes an indication of the tax element can be provided.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the language name.
Code specifying the format of free text.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: GEI-MOA A group of segments indicating the end of the details of payment and specifying hash total amounts for control purposes.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, Processing information A segment identifying the end of the details of payment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the processing information.
Identification of the processing indicator.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying a processing indicator.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Free form description of a processing indicator.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a type of process.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, Monetary amount A segment indicating total amounts for control purposes.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetaryamount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of monetary amount.
To specify a monetary amount.
Code specifying a monetary unit.
Code qualifying the type of currency.
Code specifying a status.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, Control total A segment identifying the kind of control-checks for the payment orders contained in the PAYMUL and identifying the totals according to the coded form.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Control total for checking integrity of a message orpart of a message.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of control of hash total.
To specify the value of a control quantity.
Code specifying the unit of measurement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: AUT-DTM A group of segments specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the PAYMUL message.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, Authentication result A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the PAYMUL message.

medi:field.medi:documentation: To specify the value of a validation result.
To identify the cryptographic key used for thecalculation of the validation.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the validation date/time.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNT, Message trailer A service segment ending a message, giving the total number of segments in the message (including the UNH & UNT) and the control reference number of the message.
